apps.name: Gindoo
apps.description: A task management tool for software scrum teams built on Gingee.
apps.long_description: Gindoo is a task management tool designed specifically for software scrum teams. It offers a Kanban board interface to help teams visualize their workflow, manage tasks, and collaborate effectively. With features like task assignment, due dates, and progress tracking, Gindoo aims to streamline project management and enhance team productivity.

apps.name: Gintin
apps.description: A simple blogging platform built on Gingee.
apps.long_description: Gintin is a simple blogging platform built on Gingee. It allows users to create, edit, and share blog posts with ease. With a clean and intuitive interface, Gintin aims to make blogging accessible to everyone.

apps.name: Ginzilla
apps.description: A bug tracking system for software development teams built on Gingee. Coming Soon!
apps.long_description: Ginzilla is a bug tracking system designed for software development teams. It helps teams manage and track bugs effectively, ensuring a smoother development process. With features like issue assignment, status tracking, and reporting, Ginzilla aims to enhance collaboration and productivity.

apps.name: GinTest
apps.description: The test runner for Gingee module APIs
apps.long_description: GinTest is a powerful test runner designed for testing Gingee module APIs. It provides a simple interface for executing tests, showcasing code examples and functionality of the modules offered by Gingee.
